        public static java.lang.String getStringPref(Context context,
                                             java.lang.String key,
                                             java.lang.String _default)
        Get String from persistent memory
        Parameters:
        context - the calling context
        key - the key to retrieve from persistent memory
        _default - the default value to use if the key has not been set
        Returns:
        the String stored in memory or the _default value
